      • generateSimulationPath

        public void generateSimulationPath(ModulesFile modulesFile,
                                   State initialState,
                                   java.lang.String details,
                                   long maxPathLength,
                                   java.io.File file)
                            throws PrismException
        Generate and export a random path through a model with the simulator.
        Parameters:
        modulesFile - The model
        initialState - Initial state (if null, is selected randomly)
        details - Information about the path to be generated
        file - File to output the path to (stdout if null)
        Throws:
        PrismException
